1574709000_17HiBFxSUskJt5VznGAVq8bxsqqkj.body: All files related to sites are stored in the data folder. You chould probably move the data folder to the other drive and then add a symbolic link named data in the ZeroNet folder.

> [pyrophilia](#comment_7_17HiBFxSUskJt5VznGAVq8bxsqqkjwjWsR): Also > fractalzoomer: I don't know where zeronet.conf is on windows, maybe do some digging around on your system or ask someone else. [...]

Symbolic links are present in windows: https://www.techrepublic.com/article/how-to-take-advantage-of-symbolic-links-in-window-10/

1583777872_1Jgu3kQaBojGnFj82E6Gd3tsyAsKC.body: I only answer calls from people in my contact list. If I manage to figure out who a number belongs to, and it's somebody I know, I'll probably end up calling back.
